statements: SELECT * FROM refurbishment_tracking_table WHERE component_id = 1;
SELECT component_name, refurbishment_date FROM refurbishment_tracking_table WHERE refurbishment_cost > 500;
SELECT component_id, component_name, resale_price FROM refurbishment_tracking_table ORDER BY component_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM refurbishment_tracking_table WHERE refurbishment_cost BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT component_name, refurbishment_cost, resale_price FROM refurbishment_tracking_table WHERE resale_price < refurbishment_cost;
SELECT component_name, resale_price FROM refurbishment_tracking_table WHERE refurbishment_cost > 500.00 ORDER BY refurbishment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM refurbishment_tracking_table WHERE component_name LIKE '%motherboard';
SELECT component_id, component_name, refurbishment_cost FROM refurbishment_tracking_table WHERE refurbishment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY refurbishment_cost DESC;
SELECT component_name, AVG(refurbishment_cost) AS average_cost FROM refurbishment_tracking_table GROUP BY component_name HAVING AVG(refurbishment_cost) > 200.00;
SELECT component_id, component_name, refurbishment_date, resale_price FROM refurbishment_tracking_table WHERE component_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY component_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM refurbishment_records WHERE electronic_component = 'Microcontroller' ORDER BY refurbishment_date DESC;
SELECT electronic_component, refurbishment_cost FROM refurbishment_records WHERE refurbishment_cost > 100 ORDER BY electronic_component ASC;
SELECT * FROM refurbishment_records ORDER BY refurbishment_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT electronic_component, COUNT(*) AS total_refurbishments FROM refurbishment_records GROUP BY electronic_component HAVING total_refurbishments > 3 ORDER BY total_refurbishments DESC;
SELECT electronic_component, AVG(refurbishment_cost) AS avg_cost FROM refurbishment_records GROUP BY electronic_component ORDER BY avg_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM refurbishment_records WHERE refurbishment_cost > 1000 ORDER BY refurbishment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT electronic_component, SUM(refurbishment_cost) AS total_cost FROM refurbishment_records GROUP BY electronic_component
SELECT DISTINCT electronic_component FROM resale_records ORDER BY resale_date ASC
SELECT * FROM refurbishment_records WHERE refurbishment_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND refurbishment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT resale_date, AVG(resale_price) AS average_price FROM resale_records GROUP BY resale_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM refurbishment;
SELECT component_name, refurbishment_date FROM refurbishment WHERE component_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM resale ORDER BY resale_date DESC;
SELECT component_id, resale_price, sold_to_company FROM resale WHERE component_id = 3;
SELECT component_id, status, location FROM tracking WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT * FROM refurbishment ORDER BY refurbishment_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT component_id, component_name, refurbishment_date FROM refurbishment WHERE refurbishment_notes LIKE '%damaged%'
SELECT * FROM resale WHERE resale_price > 1000 ORDER BY resale_date ASC
SELECT resale_id, component_id, sold_to_company FROM resale WHERE resale_price < 5000
SELECT tracking_id, status, location FROM tracking WHERE status = 'available'
SELECT * FROM component_stock;
SELECT component_name, location FROM refurbishment_components ORDER BY refurbishment_cost DESC;
SELECT component_name, resale_price FROM resale_components WHERE resale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT component_name, refurbishment_cost, refurbishment_date, component_id FROM refurbishment_components WHERE refurbishment_cost < 100;
SELECT component_id, action, log_date FROM component_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM refurbishment_components ORDER BY refurbishment_date DESC;
SELECT component_name, refurbishment_cost FROM refurbishment_components WHERE refurbishment_cost > 500;
SELECT component_id, component_name, refurbishment_cost, refurbishment_date FROM refurbishment_components WHERE refurbishment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT component_name, COUNT(*) AS total_refurbishments FROM refurbishment_components GROUP BY component_name HAVING total_refurbishments > 2;
SELECT r.component_name, rs.resale_date, rs.resale_price FROM refurbishment_components r JOIN resale_components rs ON r.component_id = rs.component_id ORDER BY rs.resale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM refurbishment;
SELECT component_name, refurbishment_cost FROM refurbishment ORDER BY refurbishment_cost DESC;
SELECT buyer_name, sale_price FROM component_sale WHERE sale_price > 1000;
SELECT component_name, refurbishment_date FROM refurbishment WHERE refurbishment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM component_supplier;
SELECT * FROM component_inventory;
SELECT component_name, refurbishment_cost FROM refurbishment ORDER BY refurbishment_cost DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_price, buyer_name FROM component_sale WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM component_supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT tracking_id, component_id, action_date, action_description FROM component_tracking ORDER BY action_date ASC;
